pkgmetadata.longdescription: Performs Fractal Analysis and Fractal Regression // Various functions for performing fractal and multifractal analysis including performing fractal regression. Please refer to Peng and colleagues (1994) doi:10.1103/physreve.49.1685, Kantelhardt and colleagues (2002)doi:10.1016/S0378-4371(02)01383-3, and Likens and colleagues (2019) doi:10.1016/j.physa.2019.121580.
